summary: In order to avoid the debilitating effects of a terminal illness, a young detective orders a hit on himself.
cast: Scott Wolf|Greg Wood|Ira Hawkins|Khandi Alexander|Adam LeFevre|Danielle Mason|John Doman|Benjamin John Parrillo|Katrina Law|Gabriel Byrne|Sarah Clarke|Tim Roth|Rhonda Overby|Wendy Grantham|Talia Balsam|Jennifer Horner|Elizabeth Reaser|Hayden Saunier|Jan Austell|Maggie Kaiser|Lou Demeis|Mickey Goldhaber|Wayne Duvall|Skylar Apter|Samantha Lemole|Johnny Alonso|Dan Buran|Spencer Howard|Mark Zobian|Keith Snyder|William DaRuffa|Carolyn McCormick|Donna Marrazzo|Christopher Mann|Ellen Sceiblo|Kristoffe Brodeur|Julie Funderburk|Dorene McNeill|Courtney Taylor Burness|Kym Cohen|Greg Korin|Laura LeMay|Colleen June McQuaide|Kenneth E. Remy|Franklin Ojeda Smith|Mala Wright
title: Los últimos días de Emmett Young
